pr_title: Add config samples for API-M Open tracer and API-M SDK

timeline.message: Add configs for tracing and SDK

timeline.author: dinusha92
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3913,7 +3913,12 @@ client_registration_password = "$ref{super_admin.password}"
- 
#SAMPLE
+ 
[apim.sdk]
+group_id = "org.wso2"

replies.bodyText: We are generating this through https://github.com/wso2/docs-apim/tree/3.2.0/en/tools/config-catalog-generator. This is how they are generated.
replies.author: Sarangan0219
